Articles.Content: Same with me, however I'm a mac user. Is it possible to put it as a .zip file?

Some amazing work you made mate, especially your last project!

Really enjoy using it on my various missions ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Just wanted to let you know that the Interstage decoupler from MBIpartsv1.1.2 and MBIblackpartsv1.1.2 use the same part name (flatinterstage001).

Cheers,

> 
> 
> 23 hours ago, Bev7787 said:
> 
> 
> Same with me, however I'm a mac user. Is it possible to put it as a .zip file?
> 

I highly recommend (even for .zip files) [The Unarchiver](http://unarchiver.c3.cx/unarchiver).

![BZCF4du.png](http://i.imgur.com/BZCF4du.png)

some rework on vostok probe, now with 8 sides.

in 3 parts with a new aerodynamic nosecone, probe and heatshield.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-09-18T19:09:34Z" title="09/18/2016 07:09  PM" data-short="7 yr">September 18, 2016</time> by blacsky33**

family pictures of retro parts and  wip. i will try to finish some for 1.2 release  ![^_^](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_happy.png "^_^")

![3SIYuFY.png](http://i.imgur.com/3SIYuFY.png)

us probe (mercury style).
I'm a sucker for retro-parts and I must say, I can't wait to give them a try! They look gorgeous!
Looking great as always [@blacsky33](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129435-blacsky33/)

Thx Doc , i'm trying to find missing parts in BDB and tantares/contares but it's difficult , they all do amazing job . ![:lol:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_laugh.png ":lol:")

Right now with 1.2 release , i try to update my probes parts.

[@blacsky33](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129435-blacsky33/) That rover lander platform thingy have allot of potential. Do you plan on having different format for it? It would be nice to be able to land longer and bigger rover with it.
First i need to motivate myself to texture it , it's my most complex part right now . For now i don't intend to make other sizes , sry.

![kKLlWT0.png](http://i.imgur.com/kKLlWT0.png)

update of stayputnik aerodynamic , it replace the two old parts but i will make two mini 0.625 science pressure and temperature.( like i did for inline mystery goo).
